name: Rest Assured
overview: Rest Assured is a joint venture between ResCare and the Wabash Center of Lafayette, Indiana in collaboration with the Purdue University School of Technology with general offices in Lafayette, Indiana. The Rest Assured system seeks to provide an enhance level of safety and security for consumers, while increasing staff productivity, through use of a web-based telecare system. It is designed to provide a virtual staff support person at a supported living site in lieu of constant monitoring by an on-site or physically present staff person. This allows for the sharing of limited staff resources between consumers in many different and dispersed homes or apartments.
